Description: Ring foot and base sherd from a pottery open vessel, probably a bowl or plate. The dull grey-brown silt fabric is black-slipped on the interior and exterior; Ptolemaic Delta Black Ware. There is a ring of incised rouletting on the interior. The underside of the base bears an incised inscription.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 1978 / Pottery from Naukratis: An Exhibition on the Occasion of the 11th International Congress of Classical Archaeology (no. 11)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.077)
